alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 8:32PM CDT until April 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Carroll and Leflore Counties. For the Lower Yazoo ...including Whaley, Greenwood, Belzoni, Yazoo City, Sunflower, Anguilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sunflower River At Sunflower. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Sunflower River Sunflower 21.0 20.8 Fri 7 pm CDT 22.5 22.3 22.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 830 AM CDT.
